Comment: This response demonstrates a deep understanding of the significance of the apostles being sent by Jesus in the context of the Great Commission. The elaboration on key points such as authority, empowerment, continuity, unity, and accountability shows a thorough exploration of the topic from a Christian worldview perspective. The response effectively connects the apostolic commission to the establishment and spread of Christianity, highlighting the theological framework underlying the apostles' mission. Well done!
